title.en: A High School With Only Men

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

title.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks

altTitles.zh: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

altTitles.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

altTitles.ja: 卒業

description.en: Her graduation

Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa Is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

description.en: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl, who has had 50 years of dating experience, and 100 boys… in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15 year old loner, who has all of the qualities of a "mojo." However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations…
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.

title.en: Yuutousei wa Mi no Hodo Shirazu

altTitles.ja: 優等生は身のほど知らず

altTitles.en: The Honors Student Doesn't Know His Place

description.en:
Shougetsu, an honors student at the top of his grade, discovers the wonders of developing his backside. One day, a student from the same grade, Kyoujima, sees him anal masturbating in a classroom after school. In exchange for his silence, Kyoujima tells him to continue what he was doing...?!

A curiosity-filled high-schoolers' pleasure study love!!

altTitles.ja: 見せたがりの露乃ちゃん

altTitles.zh-hk: 想要給別人看的露乃醬

altTitles.en: Tsuyuno-chan Who Wants To Show Off

description.en:
A little boy who has an armpit fetish and a high school girl who loves male attention and exposing herself so much so that she doesn't care who it is. When she notices that he has stalked her to her basketball game, she decides it wouldn't be bad to indulge him more.  
  
**Raw: [**[ComicBunch](https://www.comicbunch.com/manga/mon/tsuyunochan/) **|** [KurageBunch](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/13933686331653721909) **|** [NicoNicoBunch](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/47585)**]**

altTitles.ja: バディゴ！

description.en: Shizuku Ishiai, a 2nd year middle school student, loves dancing, but is bad at expressing herself, so she crossdresses and posts videos of her dances on the popular website "Smile Douga," under the alias "Ai." And she had declared the "dancing prince," Hayate, her rival. But, after a few unexpected events, and her attempts to best him, she's somehow thrown into an idol unit with him; furthermore, a MALE one?!

title.en: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihousareta Hakuma Doushi, S Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru ~Kono Hakuma Doushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru~

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーを追放された白魔導師、Sランク冒険者に拾われる ～この白魔導師が規格外すぎる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha Party o Tsuihousareta Hakuma Doushi, S Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru ~Kono Hakuma Doushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru~

altTitles.en: The White Mage Who was Banished from the Hero's Party is Picked up by an S Rank Adventurer: This White Mage is Too Out of the Ordinary!

description.en: One day, Lloyd, a white mage, is banished from the hero’s party. Lloyd, who has lost his job, happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest by chance. At that time, no one knew that the hero’s party would collapse and Lloyd would gain fame - yet. This is the story of an extraordinary support magic-user who thinks he is normal, becomes an adventurer, while he is unaware of how he eventually becomes peerless.
description.pt-br: Um dia, Lloyd, um mago branco, é banido da festa do herói. Lloyd, que perdeu o emprego, por acaso acompanha um grupo de rank S em uma missão. Naquela época, ninguém sabia que o partido do herói entraria em colapso e Lloyd ganharia fama - ainda. Esta é a história de um extraordinário usuário de magia de suporte que pensa que é normal, torna-se um aventureiro, embora não saiba como eventualmente se torna incomparável.

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

title.en: Isekai Ooku de JK wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Oooku de JK wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.en: A JK Falls in Love in the Depths of Another World

altTitles.ja: 異世界大奥でJKは恋をする

description.en:
16 year old Himeno Shion has never experienced love. Unfortunately, she suddenly hit by a truck and gets transported no another world!

[Do you want to all in love?]

Right when she's about be eaten by a dragon, she gets saved by handsome hero named Ars. After bring Shion to his castle, Dragonia, she discovers that he wants to gather a harem girls from other races!?

altTitles.ja: デビルマンサーガ

description.en: Set in 2025, a roboticist named Fudou Yuuki joins a project involving a large mural depicting humanity's true past as well as the ancient but advanced technology found in Antarctica.

title.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

altTitles.ja: 訳アリ心霊マンション
弟の夫

description.en:
Ten years ago Yaichi's twin brother moved to Canada and married a man called Mike. A month ago, he died.  
  
Now Mike has arrived in Japan to meet Yaichi and his daughter Kana. Yaichi has to face his own preconceptions and come to terms with who his brother really was.  
  
[Official English](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/545416/my-brothers-husband-volumes-1-and-2-by-gengoroh-tagame/)

Adapted to [Live Action](https://www.cinra.net/article/column-201803-otoutonootto) in 2018.

---
- **Won the 19th Japan Media Arts Festival Division Excellence Award in 2015**
- **Won the 47th Japan Cartoonists Association Excellence Award in 2018**
description.uk:
Звичайнісінький день Яїчі Оріґучі перериває кремезний іноземець, який з'являється перед дверима і обіймає його. Чоловік представляється Майком Фленаґаном, і Яїчі швидко дізнається, що Майк — вдівець Рьоджі, його молодшого брата-близнюка. Відтоді як Рьоджі виїхав до Канади десять років тому Яїчі не чув про нього нічого, окрім того, що він одружився з іноземцем і помер місяць тому.

У той час як Яїчі занепокоєний, його маленька донька Кана в захваті від ідеї мати дядька-ґея з Канади. Нерозуміння Каною поглядів японського суспільства на гомосексуальність змушує Яїчі замислитися над власними упередженими уявленнями. І поки Майк продовжує жити в родині, Яїчі поступово дізнається більше про свого зятя і згадує своє минуле з Рьоджі.
description.pt-br: Há dez anos, o irmão gêmeo de Yaichi acabou se mudando para o Canadá. Como os dois não conversavam tanto, a viagem ao exterior só ajudou a aumentar a distância entre eles. Um mês atrás, Yaichi recebeu a notícia do falecimento de seu irmão e, pouco tempo depois, ele recebe a visita de Mike, seu cunhado. Ele viajou ao Japão para conhecer a família e os lugares de que o seu falecido marido tanto falava. Embora relutante, a família o recebe e Yaichi não só confronta os seus preconceitos com relação à homossexualidade, como também conhece um outro lado do seu irmão e passa a acompanhar como a próxima geração pode lidar com tais questões.

title.en: Duel Masters LOST: Crystal of Remembrance

altTitles.ja: Duel Masters LOST ～追憶の水晶～

description.en: A new “Duel Masters” story begins! Kirifuda Win, who has lost all memories of his past, is now living alone in Tokyo. In the midst of his ordinary daily life, the footsteps of the world’s end gradually begin to draw near. The secret of Win’s hidden past is…?

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん 外伝

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Gaiden
Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Side Story

description.en: A special, two-part side story manga set in the world of *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun*, focusing on Naberius Kalego during his days as a student of Babyls Demon School.

This is a story about: a female lead who transforms into a child after losing her virginity, her identity switches between an adult and a kid. With the crown prince who has a dual personality too, there's equal parts love and bite.

altTitles.ja: ノラと雑草

altTitles.vi: Kẻ lang thang và nhành cỏ dại

description.en:
The place where I belong is with you.  
A runaway girl who knows no hope. A middle-aged detective who has lost hope. Through their meeting, this hopelessness begins to melt away.  
  
Following the death of his daughter, Assistant Inspector Yamada Hajime has lost hope in everything, and jobs like closing under-aged prostitution rings don't exactly help matters. But there he meets a girl who looks alarmingly like his late daughter. Her name is Umino Shiori, a runaway girl who's desperate enough to sell herself to escape her house but won't tell anyone why.
description.vi:
Đứa trẻ bơ vơ chẳng biết hy vọng. Thanh tra lạc lõng chẳng còn ước mong. Rồi họ gặp nhau, và nỗi vô vọng này bắt đầu tan biến.

Sau cái chết của con gái, phó thanh tra Yamada Hajime đã mất hy vọng vào tất cả mọi thứ, và công việc triệt phá các ổ mại dâm cũng không xoa dịu được ông là bao. Nhưng rồi một ngày kia, ông gặp một người trông hệt như đứa con đã mất. Tên cô bé là Umino Shiori, một cô gái vì muốn chạy thoát khỏi nhà mình mà đã tuyệt vọng đến nỗi đi bán thân, thế nhưng Umino lại chẳng bao giờ kể cho bất kỳ ai lý do vì sao mình làm thế.

description.en: A prince found a mysterious potion that is thought to make one more beautiful, so he gave it to his knight. However…

altTitles.ja: うみそらかぜに花

description.en:
The sea is clear and the sky is full of stars. Kaname and Ami live in the countryside and are preparing for the school festival. Their relationship is somewhat close despite their clashes...?

A lyrical coming-of-age tale by Masaru Oishi!

In New Pantheon City, monstrous "Voids" have plagued the people for over 500 years. 

However, they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.

Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation, vulgar personality, and lack of social finesse, he has found himself entering high school alone.

That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district, the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty

title.en: Doukutsu Ou kara Hajimeru Rakuen Life ~Bannou no Saikutsu Skill de Saikyou ni!?~

altTitles.ja: 洞窟王からはじめる楽園ライフ ～万能の採掘スキルで最強に!?～

altTitles.en: A Cave King’s Road to Paradise: Climbing to the Top with My Almighty Mining Skills!

altTitles.ru: Пещерный король будет жить как в раю

altTitles.th: ชีวิตประจำวันของจอมราชันย์เริ่มต้นด้วยการขุดเหมือง

description.en: Hiel was ridiculed for having a useless crest and was exiled to a remote island. When he grabbed an pickaxe to reclaim the island, the true effect of his crest was revealed. With his production cheat he will reclaim this uninhabited island and start his life in paradise.
description.ja: 使えない＜紋章＞持ちと嘲笑され、荒れ果てた離島に追放されたヒール。 なんとか島を開拓しようとピッケルを握ったそのとき、紋章の真なる効果が発揮されて―ー!?

altTitles.ja: タランタランタラン～鳴り響く音にのせて～

description.en:
“Dawn” entered the hall with her calm movements and stood in the middle. Her face showed no emotions, like a doll, but she was captivating and elegant, strikingly like an ice queen. Exer smiled lightly, spread her legs, and said, ‘As Lord, I will embrace you tonight.’ A fateful encounter for the first time. A woman falls in love at first sight. And a man fights the world for this woman. ‘If this world cannot accept her as a wife, then I will change this world.’ A love story between Dawn, the Eastern girl who endured a tough childhood while fleeing from war and became a slave, and Exer, the handsome man who was known as the strongest warrior in the kingdom.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/64041447)

title.en: Dame Ningen to Tsukiatte Kureteiru Kanojo to Date Chuu

altTitles.ja: ダメ人間と付き合ってくれている彼女とデート中

altTitles.ja-ro: Dame Ningen to Tsukiattekureteiru Kanojo to Date Chuu

altTitles.en: I'm on a Date With a Girlfriend Who's Dating a Loser

altTitles.ja: 酒と鬼は二合まで

altTitles.ja-ro: Sake to Oni wa Nigou made
Sake to Onna wa Ni-gō made

description.en:
Shida Naori is a college student who loves making alcoholic drinks but has no friends to share them with. At a mixer, she meets Ibuki Hinata, who she ends up taking home with her. After making her a drink, Naori discovers that Hinata is an ogre-girl descended from Shuten-doji who needs alcohol to live, can only drink alcohol offered to her by humans, and grows horns whenever she drinks. Thus, Hinata decides to make Naori her personal bartender.

---

Alternative [Amazon Retail Link](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4757574061) (Physical)

altTitles.ja: おぼろとまち

description.en: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?! A new era of friendship and youthful comedy unfolds!

title.en: Fist of the North Star - Strawberry Flavor

altTitles.ja: 北斗の拳 イチゴ味

description.en:
In this *very* zany take on the dramatic series by Buronson and Tetsuo Hara, the end of the century… wasn't so bad, actually. A *very* special and brave Holy Emperor, Souther, wants to become more "involved" and to be on "friendly terms" with the noble Kenshiro & his posse. *Especially* Kenshiro. Due to his very outgoing nature, he also crashes the homes of his other buddies, often when they *especially* don't want him to show up!  
  
Join Souther as he releases his feelings in heart-throbbing, mind-bending confessions, settles complex and engrossing territorial disputes with deep and intricate consequences, enjoys the simple and introspective pleasures of a quiet dinner, and climbs the top of the rough and brutal pyramid that is the idol world - with the help of his best buddies, of course! Maybe even Kenshiro will be there - who knows!  
  
By the time it got its anime in 2015, *Strawberry Flavor* had sold over 1 million copies in Japan. The anime was composed of 2-minute long, abridged adaptations of select chapters from the first three volumes. They were placed after the main episodes of *DD Fist of the North Star* season 2.  
  
Every volume also contains at least one *gaiden* (side story). These gaiden are drawn in Yukito's (the elder sister of Yukito Imouto) normal artstyle, and expand on characters who did not receive gaiden during the Hokuto Gaiden period in the late 2000's.  
  
Gaiden List:  
Volume 1: Spade, Club & Diamond, Heart  
Volume 2: Souther  
Volume 3: Shuren & Huey  
Volume 4: Fudo  
Volume 5: Yuda  
Volume 6: Shin  
Volume 7: Falco & friends, Ein  
Volume 8: Ogai  
Volume 9: Devil Rebirth

Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?  
  
Hunting erotic commentary enthusiastically!
description.ja: へっぽこ武道家、つんけん白魔、ものぐさ黒魔、酔いどれ戦士、４人の新米ガード達は街の平和を守るため、魔物に立ち向かうが、ことごとく凌辱を受けることに…
description.es-la: Las cuatro guardias novatas -una artista marcial cabeza hueca, un demonio blanco pellizcado, un demonio negro perezoso y una guerrera borracha- se enfrentan a los demonios para proteger la paz de la ciudad, pero son humilladas a cada paso...

altTitles.ja: 災い狐のくずれちゃん

title.en: Ain Soph In The Finite World

altTitles.ja: 有限世界のアインソフ

description.en: A vampire hunter is teaming up with a vampire girl to reach his goal to save immortals and mortals alike.

altTitles.ja: 甘々シンデレラ

altTitles.vi: Những nàng lọ lem ngọt ngào của tiệm bánh

description.en: "I want my little sister to eat a cake!" Minori, a male college student, decided to work part-time at a super popular cake shop with that in mind. The shop is located inside a school for young ladies!? Can a boy bad at communicating, who can't even look straight in the eye and speak properly run a cake shop with four JK patissiers? Enjoy a teen romantic comedy sweeter than a cake♪
description.ja:
妹にケーキを食べさせたい！」その一心で超人気洋菓子店でのバイトを始めることに決めた男子大学生のみのり。しかしその店があるのはなんと“お嬢様学校の中”！？　まともに目を見てしゃべれないコミュ障男子がJKパティシエ4人とともにお店を切り盛りできるのか？　ケーキよりも甘～い青春ラブコメをご賞味あれ!

まともに目を見てしゃべれないコミュ障大学生の季村みのり。妹にケーキを食べさせたい一心で超人気洋菓子店でバイトに応募したがそこはなんとお嬢様学校の構内にある店だった！　春宮苺、夏野もも、秋山林檎、冬月みかん、４人のJKパティシエと一緒にお店を切り盛りすることに!?

altTitles.ja: ケイ

description.en:
K (Ka) is the name of a mysterious climber who do not know their origin or their real name, although suspected to be Japanese. He occasionally performs functions sherpa carrier or for expeditions want to climb the Himalayan mountains.

His extraordinary skill as a climber have made him a sort of legend among the locals and their services are often required to perform rescues in the most extreme situations. But K does not work for money, he sees in the mountains not only a personal challenge but a way of being part of nature itself, thus using the lessons of the tribes of the area and the observation of animal behavior to solve the difficulties it presents the mountain. 

So we will see, over five chapters, how K must face increasingly tough challenges and the struggle for survival and personal growth that involves climbing mountains over 8000 meters.

K is a work frankly atypical when compared to most comics or sleeves that are published in our country, and is an adaptation of a famous Japanese novel written by Yumemakura Baku.

altTitles.ja: L'un des grands secrets d'une femme fatale.

altTitles.en: One of the great secrets of a femme fatale.

altTitles.ja: 娘の友達

description.en: Kosuke has lived to play the ideal self as a father at home and as a manager at work. However, his life changes 180 degrees when he meets his daughter’s friend. In front of her, Kosuke was able to be his real self and his worn-out heart was healed. However, he knows that these are feelings that should never be held. The story of the Middle Aged Man Meets Girl, presented to the modern people who suppress themselves in society, begins.
description.pt: Kousuke viveu para interpretar o ser ideal como pai em casa e como gerente no trabalho. No entanto, sua vida muda 180 graus quando ela conhece a amiga da sua filha. Na sua frente, Kousuke poderia mostrar seu verdadeiro eu, e seu coração desgastado foi curado. No entanto, ele sabe que esses são sentimentos que nunca devem ser mantidos. Começa a história do homem de meia idade que conhece uma garota, apresentada para pessoas modernas que são reprimidas na sociedade!

description.en: A member of the corporate organization, the Jinhong faction, Nam Eunho, is a spy that was planted by the rival organization, the Deokeun faction. In the midst of stealing supplies, to secure funds for her faction, and to manipulate their books, under the orders of the Jinhong faction’s boss, she was tasked in monitoring his daughter, Chun Hee-Min. Hee-Min, who is unknown to the outside world, confuses Eunho through her existence. Behind closed entrance doors of a spacious room, where the air is dry, and nothing but the scent of the two people living there filling it, the two of them build a peculiar bond. But as emotions deepen, and shake their reason, the two of them end up making choices that can not be reversed

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.ja: ホワッツ マイケル

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Michael's seemingly carefree daily life, with his pampering and begging for food, is thrillingly unpredictable, including a fall from the seventh floor and an interrogation on suspicion of theft of Pen Nibs! Michael's daily life created the golden age of cat manga that took the 1980s by storm! 

The "dancing cat" that won the Kodansha Manga Award, was made into an anime TV series, a TV drama, and even appearing in TV commercials. Michael, who, has become a hit with the general public, is back in digital form! Beware of the too cute cat!

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/3004-968/Whats-Michael-Fatcat-Collection-Volume-1-TPB)

---
- **As mentioned in the description, What's Michael? Won the 10th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1986, shared with Osamu Tezuka's [Message to Adolf](https://mangadex.org/title/16dc43f3-d6ba-4154-b445-a9d2e674c0eb/message-to-adolf)**

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni: Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero - The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family -

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash — the one who decimated the Demon Lord’s army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd’s companion!? This is the story of a man, hailed as the strongest, yet unable to recognize his own worth, finding a “family”.
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

altTitles.ja: 高嶺の華は乱れ咲き

description.en: She is the perfect student, beautiful, clever and with lots of friends… He is an ordinary boy in the class, staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

title.en: Kirby of the Stars: Pupupu Hero

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ プププヒーロー

description.en:
Kirby, the gourmand who will suck up anything, has come to the peaceful land of Pupupu!
"Pleased to eat you! I'm Kirby!"

The slapstick and lively days are about to begin, involving Chilly, who has come to live with Kirby!

altTitles.ja: ラストマン

description.en:
A mysterious boy lies naked and unconscious on the street. The story begins when ninth grader, Ai Oomori, and his third grader brother, Seigi, find him. This boy has no memory of the past and doesn't even know his real name. He is like a little baby. Ai names this boy Makoto and takes him back home. Makoto has superhuman physical powers and can even recover quickly from injuries. Who is Makoto? Makoto is easygoing and not at all bothered by everyone's curiosity. Until that is he is pursued by a cruel woman who disguises herself as a spider. A neo sapiens, this spider woman has been dispatched by a mystery organization called, "Love & Peace." Her mission is to bring back Makoto dead or alive.  
  
Source: MU

The girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, she decided to give herself to a man at the age of 28 … because she did not want to live this "abnormal life". Only after leaving her, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

altTitles.ja: ラグナクリムゾン

altTitles.th: ตำนานนักล่ามังกร

description.en: Ragna is a dragon hunter along with his partner, the strongest dragon hunter Leo. He didn't have much talent at hunting dragons but he had decided to entrust his whole life for her. However he was shown the feel of true despair by his future self on what would happen if he stays weak as he is now. With that, it seems that the reaper of the dragons had now appeared earlier than the original history, but will it be enough to change the future?
description.es: Ragna es un cazador de dragones junto con su compañera, la cazadora de dragones más fuerte, Leo. No tenía mucho talento para cazar dragones, pero había decidido confiar toda su vida a ella. Sin embargo, su yo del futuro le mostró la verdadera desesperación de lo que le ocurriría si seguía siendo tan débil como hasta ahora. Con eso, parece que la parca de los dragones ha aparecido antes que en la historia original, pero ¿será suficiente para cambiar el futuro?
description.pt:
Ragna é um caçador de dragões junto com sua parceira, a mais forte caçadora de dragões, Leo. Ele não tinha muito talento para caçar dragões, mas decidiu confiar toda a sua vida a ela. No entanto, foi mostrado a ele a sensação do verdadeiro desespero pelo seu próprio eu do futuro, sobre o que aconteceria se ele permanecesse fraco como ele é agora. Com isso, parece que o ceifador dos dragões apareceu mais cedo do que na história original, mas será isso o suficiente para mudar o futuro?  
  
**Links**:  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/D_Koba)
description.es-la: Ragna es un cazador de dragones junto con su compañera, la cazadora de dragones más fuerte, Leo. No tenía mucho talento para cazar dragones, pero había decidido confiar toda su vida a ella. Sin embargo, su yo del futuro le mostró la verdadera desesperación de lo que le ocurriría si seguía siendo tan débil como hasta ahora. Con eso, parece que la parca de los dragones ha aparecido antes que en la historia original, pero ¿será suficiente para cambiar el futuro?
description.pt-br: Ragna é um caçador de dragões junto com sua parceira, a mais forte caçadora de dragões, Leo. Ele não tinha muito talento para caçar dragões, mas decidiu confiar toda a sua vida a ela. No entanto, foi mostrado a ele a sensação do verdadeiro desespero pelo seu próprio eu do futuro, sobre o que aconteceria se ele permanecesse fraco como ele é agora. Com isso, parece que o shinigami dos dragões apareceu mais cedo do que na história original, mas será isso o suficiente para mudar o futuro?

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.
